sentences.text: MESSAGE FROM OUR PRESIDENT, CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND CHAIRMAN-ELECT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Blake D. Moret  President, Chief   Executive Officer and  Chairman-Elect
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: December 13, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareowners:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Im very pleased with our progress in fiscal 2017 to bring The Connected Enterprise to life for customers  around the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We integrate control and information across the enterprise to make industrial  companies and their people more productive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The fundamental drivers of growth in our markets  remain very strong, as do the compelling reasons that support our continued ability to increase market  share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nobody is better positioned in this market.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Market-beating revenue growth continues to enable  our superior financial performance, and consequently, shareowner value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal year 2017, we delivered superior returns on your investment in Rockwell Automation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our sales  were up over 7%, EPS was up 14%, we had another good year of free cash flow conversion and return on  invested capital, and we returned over $725 million in capital to shareowners through share repurchases  and dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We executed well on the three keys to our above-market revenue growth:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Share gains in core platforms: Logix grew 10%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This multi-discipline, information-enabled  control platform continues to help customers be more productive in discrete, hybrid, and process  applications.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other parts of our core also continue to gain share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EPS was up 14%  and we  returned over $725 million  in capital to shareowners  through share repurchases  and dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Double-digit growth in Information Solutions and Connected Services: Information Solutions  and Connected Services are helping our customers reach new levels of productivity, and pilots are  progressing to multi-site rollouts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Execution of our acquisition strategy: Our recent acquisitions contributed a point and a half of  profitable revenue growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They also accelerated the execution of our strategy by providing new  forms of innovation in technology, additional application expertise, and new market access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our objective is to combine our capabilities and those of our partners to provide positive business  outcomes for industrial companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Examples of positive outcomes include increased production  and flexibility for automobile powertrain suppliers moving into the Electric Vehicle market; faster  startup of new snack food lines to capture market share in emerging markets; and remote monitoring  of processes to reduce labor costs and increase safety.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When we help our customers successfully  compete, our value increases, and so does their loyalty.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our differentiation helps us win across the automation and information landscape.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our technology  innovation enhances performance, and we are focused on providing the ease of use and simplification  that drive customer productivity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Increasing application expertise, organically and through acquisitions,  allows us to help customers better identify and define their business problems and to apply our  technology in the most effective manner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our limited distribution model and other forms of market  access continue to evolve to accommodate the crucial role of software and recurring services in the  solutions we provide to customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The heart of our success is our people, working together in a single integrated business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our employees  create a culture that embraces new ideas and points of view and promotes doing business the right  way.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Winning the 2017 Catalyst Award recognizing our success in increasing diversity was a special  honor, and demonstrated the impact of our long-term commitment to expanding opportunities for  ALL employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This fall we also graduated the first class of veterans from our Academy of Advanced  Manufacturing, a program that will help close the manufacturing skills gap and give new opportunities  to a group of people who richly deserve our efforts to help them get ahead.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we look ahead, well continue our focus on the attractive industrial automation and information  market, growing share by bringing The Connected Enterprise to life, and delivering the resulting  superior returns to our shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Blake D. Moret  President, Chief Executive Officer and Chairman-Elect
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory Vote on Executive Compensation PAGE 58
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends that you vote FOR this item.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We ask our shareowners to approve on an advisory basis the  compensation of our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our  compensation programs and practices are appropriate and effective in implementing our compensation philosophy, support achieving our  goals with appropriate levels of risk and are aligned with shareowner  interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program includes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: very limited perquisites;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: stock ownership requirements for officers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: annual incentive compensation payouts tied directly to  performance and capped at 200% of target, limiting excessive  awards for short-term performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: multiple-year vesting of long-term incentive awards;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a balanced mix of long-term incentives, including stock options,  performance shares and restricted stock, to motivate long-term  performance and reward executives for absolute gains in share  price and relative performance based on total shareowner return  compared to the S&P 500 Index;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: claw-back agreements and a recoupment policy; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: absence of employment contracts with our named  executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation PAGE 29
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program is designed to attract and  retain executive talent and emphasize pay for performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our  compensation program includes base salary, annual incentive  compensation, long-term incentives, defined benefit and defined  contribution retirement plans and a very limited perquisite package.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation program includes the following key principles:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long-term incentives reward management for creating  shareowner value and align the financial interests of executives  and shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Incentive compensation payouts vary significantly from year to  year based on performance compared to goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We seek sustained growth and performance through various activities  that depend on our executives for their planning and execution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We  believe it is important to align the compensation of our leadership  with this growth and performance strategy through pay for  performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our shareowners support this philosophy  based on the overwhelming level of shareowner support for the  proposal to approve the compensation of our named executive  officers presented at our 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation decisions are based on a number of factors,  including market compensation rates, Company performance  against pre-established goals and the relative share performance  of the Company compared to the broader stock market, as well as  the experience and contributions of individual executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of an executives compensation is directly  linked to our performance and the creation of shareowner value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2018 Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareowners of Rockwell Automation, Inc. will be held at 5:30 p.m. (Central Standard Time) on February 6, 2018, for  the purposes set forth in the accompanying Notice of 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement and the accompanying proxy  are furnished in connection with the solicitation by our Board of Directors of proxies to be used at the meeting and at any adjournment of the  meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will refer to the company in this proxy statement as we, us, our, the Company or Rockwell Automation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement and form of proxy are being distributed or made available to shareowners beginning on or about  December 21, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rockwell Automation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We integrate control and information across the enterprise to help  industrial companies and their people be more productive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are  a leader in industrial automation and information; we make our  customers more productive and the world more sustainable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our  products, solutions and services are designed to meet our customers  needs to reduce total cost of ownership, maximize asset utilization,  improve time to market and reduce enterprise business risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We were incorporated in Delaware in connection with a tax-free  reorganization completed on December 6, 1996, pursuant to  which we divested our former aerospace and defense business (the  A&D Business) to The Boeing Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the reorganization, RIC  contributed all of its businesses, other than the A&D Business, to us and  distributed all of our capital stock to RICs shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Boeing then  acquired RIC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company continues the business founded as the Allen-Bradley  Company in 1903.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The privately-owned Allen-Bradley was a leading  North American manufacturer of industrial automation equipment  when the former Rockwell International Corporation (RIC) purchased it  in 1985.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our principal executive office is located at 1201 South Second  Street, Milwaukee, Wisconsin 53204, USA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our telephone  number is +1 (414) 382-2000 and our website is located at  www.rockwellautomation.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our common stock trades on the  New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under the symbol ROK.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: www.rockwellautomation.com 5

sentences.text: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LETTER FROM LEAD INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareowner:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Donald R. Parfet
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is a privilege to serve as the lead independent director of the Board, working with a group  of highly-engaged, talented and knowledgeable directors who share a deep commitment to  independent leadership, proactive oversight and strong corporate governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I would like to  highlight the accomplishments of the past year and the ways the Board enhanced its practices in the  best interests of shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective governance includes continued and thoughtful assessment of our governance practices  and shareowner engagement on emerging governance issues and best practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Last year, based  on shareowner feedback and after evaluation by the full Board, the Board decided to follow the  shareowner vote on the frequency of say on pay and continue to give shareowners an annual advisory  vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board adopted revised Audit Committee and Board  Composition and Governance Committee charters, and created a lead independent director charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The adoption of the lead independent director charter and associated changes to the Board  Composition and Governance Committee charter serves to formalize, strengthen and clearly define  the role and responsibilities of the lead independent director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At a high level, the lead independent  director works to ensure that the Board functions with appropriate independence from management  and any non-independent directors and serves as the liaison between the independent directors and  management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In response to shareowner feedback, the Board amended the Audit Committee charter  to explicitly state that the Audit Committee will annually review whether to change audit firms and  committed to enhance the disclosure in this proxy statement around the Audit Committees oversight  of the Companys independent audit firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The lead independent director charter and amended Audit  Committee and Board Composition and Governance Committee charters are available on the Rockwell Automation website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: "...the Board enhanced  its practices in the best  interests of shareowners."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Refreshment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board appreciates its responsibility to provide effective oversight and works to maintain a  proper balance of tenure, diversity, skills and experience on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We align Board skills with the  Companys long-term strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board understands the importance of recruiting new directors  to bring fresh perspectives and new ideas to the boardroom, and since 2015, we have added three  new independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a whole, we are proud of our Board diversity in skills and backgrounds,  including the increased number of female directors, which we discuss in more detail in this  proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The collective skills and expertise of our directors offer the essential qualifications to provide effective  oversight of the Companys business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and its Committees regularly review the Companys  strategic priorities, both long- and short-term, to best position the Company to create long-term value  for shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is, indeed, my privilege to serve as lead independent director of this Board and to work closely with  the Chairman, the CEO, and the other directors, each of whom remains committed to serving your best  interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the entire Board, thank you for your continued engagement and support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Donald R. Parfet  Lead Independent Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our risk oversight is aligned with the Boards oversight of the  Companys strategies and plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thus, the Board ordinarily receives  reports on the risks implicated by the Companys strategic  decisions concurrent with the deliberations leading to those  decisions.

sentences.text: From time to time, the full Board will receive reports from  management on enterprise risks that are not specifically assigned to a  specific Committee.

sentences.text: Overview
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is responsible for proactively overseeing the business and  affairs of the Company, including corporate governance, business  strategy, business performance, executive compensation, capital  management, and the Companys management, including succession  and development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is focused on helping the Company  achieve long-term value creation for its shareowners and other  stakeholders, and maintaining the Companys strong reputation for  integrity and ethical conduct in all of the Companys relationships and  business transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe we have an effective risk management system that fosters  a culture of appropriate risk taking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have strong internal processes  and a strong control environment to identify and manage risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We  also believe that our current leadership structure, with Mr. Nosbusch  serving as current Chairman and Mr. Moret serving as CEO and  Chairman-elect, enhances the Boards effectiveness in overseeing risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both Mr. Nosbusch and Mr. Moret have extensive knowledge of the  Companys business and operations that helps the Board to identify  and address key risks facing the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officers are  assigned responsibility for managing the risks deemed most significant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Boards Role in Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The responsibility for managing risk rests with executive management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has primary responsibility for oversight of managements  program of enterprise risk management for the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  standing Committees of the Board address the risks related to their  respective areas of oversight, and the Audit Committee is responsible  for reviewing the overall guidelines and policies that govern our  process for risk assessment and management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended September 30,  2017 contains an extensive description of the most significant  enterprise risks that we face.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management periodically reports to the Board regarding the system  that management has implemented to assess, manage and monitor  risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management also reports to the Board on the risks it has assessed  to be the most significant, together with managements plans to  mitigate those risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Boards Role in Management Succession  Planning/Organizational Health
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board considers succession planning and development to be  a critical part of the Companys long-term strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The full Board  oversees CEO and senior management succession and development  plans and receives regular reports on employee engagement  and retention matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At least annually the Board reviews senior  management succession and development plans with our CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With  regard to CEO succession planning, the Board regularly discusses  potential CEO candidates and their development and preparedness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our risk management system seeks to ensure that the Board is  informed of major risks facing the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee  provides oversight regarding financial risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee  receives regular reports on management policies and practices relating  to the Companys financial statements and the effectiveness of internal  controls over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also receives  regular reports from the Companys independent auditors and general  auditor as well as the General Counsel regarding legal and compliance  risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee considers the risk implications  of the incentives created by our compensation programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  Technology and Corporate Responsibility Committee oversees risks  related to technology, safety, and environmental protection, among  other corporate responsibility matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board Composition and  Governance Committee oversees governance-related risks, including  conflicts of interest, director independence, and board and committee  structure and performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate responsibility is an important priority for the Board and  the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a strong reputation for being an ethical and  responsible company and that starts with the tone set by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards Technology and Corporate Responsibility Committee  reviews and addresses our diversity and inclusion and environmental  protection and sustainability practices regularly, and reports its findings  to the full Board.

sentences.text: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal 2017, the Committee selected Willis Towers Watson to serve as its independent compensation consultant  after assessing the firms independence, taking into consideration the following factors, among others:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2016, Towers Watson and Willis merged to form Willis Towers Watson.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2010, Towers  Perrin merged with Watson Wyatt  the Companys long-time actuary  to create Towers Watson.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  Committees relationship with the compensation consultants at Towers Watson pre-dates the 2010 merger by  over six years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Willis Towers Watson consultants to the Committee have worked with the Committee since Towers Perrin was engaged by the Committee in November 2003; their performance and counsel over this period have  indicated objectivity and independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees oversight of the relationship between the Company and Willis Towers Watson mitigates  the possibility that management could misuse other engagements to influence Willis Towers Watsons  compensation work for the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Willis Towers Watson has adopted internal safeguards to ensure that its executive compensation advice is  independent and has provided the Committee with a written assessment of the independence of its advisory  work to the Committee for fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee retains ultimate decision-making authority for all executive pay matters and understands  Willis Towers Watsons role is simply that of advisor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no significant business or personal relationships between Willis Towers Watson and any of our  executives or members of the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on this assessment, the Compensation Committee has concluded that it is receiving objective, unbiased and  independent advice from Willis Towers Watson and that its work for the Company does not raise any conflict of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Related Person Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board adopted a written policy regarding how it will review  and approve related person transactions (as defined below).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  Board Composition and Governance Committee is responsible for  administering this policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy is available on our website at  https://ir.rockwellautomation.com/corporate-governance/  governance-documents/default.aspx.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy defines a related person transaction as any transaction in  which the Company is or will be a participant, in which the amount  involved exceeds $120,000, and in which any director, director  nominee, executive officer or more than 5% shareowner or any of their  immediate family members has or will have a direct or indirect material  interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy sets forth certain transactions, arrangements and  relationships not reportable under SEC rules that do not constitute  related person transactions.

sentences.text: Nomination Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board Composition and Governance Committee is responsible for  screening potential director candidates and recommending qualified  candidates to the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee, the Chairman, the Chief Executive Officer or other  members of the Board may identify a need to add new members to  the Board or fill a vacancy on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that case, the Committee  will initiate a search for qualified director candidates, seeking input  from senior management and Board members, and to the extent  it deems it appropriate, outside search firms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee will  evaluate qualified candidates and then make its recommendation to  the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee will consider director candidates recommended  by shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareowners can recommend director candidates  by writing to the Corporate Secretary at Rockwell Automation,  1201 South Second Street, Milwaukee, Wisconsin 53204, USA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  recommendation must include the candidates name, biographical  data and qualifications and any other information required by the  SEC to be included in a proxy statement with respect to a director  nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any shareowner recommendation must be accompanied  by a written statement from the candidate indicating his or her  willingness to serve if nominated and elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recommending  shareowner also must provide evidence of being a shareowner of  record of our common stock at that time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making its recommendations to the Board with respect to director  candidates, the Committee considers various criteria set forth in our  Board Membership Criteria (see Exhibit A to the Committees Charter),  including experience, professional background, specialized expertise,  diversity and concern for the best interests of shareowners as a whole.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, directors must be of the highest character and integrity, be  free of conflicts of interest with the Company, and have sufficient time  available to devote to the affairs of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee from  time to time reviews with the Board our Board Membership Criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to recommending director candidates to the Committee,  shareowners may nominate candidates for election to the Board  directly at the annual shareowner meeting by following the  procedures and providing the information, set forth in our by-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Shareowner Proposals for 2019 Annual Meeting set forth later in this  proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eligible shareowners may also use our proxy access  by-law to nominate candidates for election to our Board provided the  shareowners and nominees satisfy specified requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee will evaluate properly submitted shareowner  recommendations under substantially the same criteria and in  substantially the same manner as other potential candidates.

sentences.text: Capabilities and Experience
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a public company operating in over 80 countries, we are subject to  broad financial regulations and reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To address the needs of the  Company, all of our directors have a high level of financial literacy, an  understanding of complex global financial transactions, and four of  our Audit Committee members are audit committee financial experts  as defined by the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our directors and nominees have relevant  experience in accounting and financial reporting, corporate finance  and audit committee functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is carefully composed to include directors with a diverse  range of skills, experience, perspective and expertise, which empowers  it to provide sound guidance relevant to the Companys scope,  strategy, operations, and growth and profitability objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Leadership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of our directors has significant experience in leadership roles  in large companies, with 50 percent holding or having held CEO  positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally people with strong leadership skills provide  unique insights and are familiar with complex business strategy and  operations and leadership development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this type of  leadership experience is valuable to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Industry
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We seek directors who have an understanding of the industries we  serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Several of our directors have experience with technology  and manufacturing companies, including automation, consumer  products, energy, industrial products, semiconductors, software and  pharmaceuticals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This type of experience is important to the Boards  oversight of the Companys strategic plan and business operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: International
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our global presence is important to our competitive advantage.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many  of our directors have significant international business experience,  which provides them with a deep understanding of our position in  global markets and regional and local challenges.

sentences.text: Risk
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board believes that it contains an ideal balance of newer  and longer-tenured directors, so we get the benefit of both fresh  perspectives and extensive experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Three current directors have  served for more than ten years, while six directors were added to the  Board in the past five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes its current tenure mix  is appropriate for the Board at this time and recognizes the merits of  a board with balanced tenure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our directors with longer service are  highly valued for their experience and Company-specific knowledge.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They have a deep understanding of our business, provide historical  context in Board considerations of Company strategy, and enhance  Board dynamics and the Boards relationship with management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the ordinary course of our business, we face various strategic,  operating, compliance and financial risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that an  understanding of these risks is important for directors to provide  oversight of enterprise risk management and risk mitigation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of  our directors and nominees have extensive and broad experience in  risk oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Technology
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Company is committed to enabling the next generation of smart  manufacturing and The Connected Enterprise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a Company focused on technology innovation, we seek directors with technology and  engineering backgrounds.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Several of our directors have extensive  technology experience, cyber security experience and degrees  in engineering.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board regularly reviews director succession and the mix of Board  composition, diversity and experience, especially when adding a new  member.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of this process, the Board evaluates the contributions  and tenure of current Board members and compares them to the skills  that might benefit the Company in light of emerging needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board  seeks people with a variety of occupational and personal backgrounds  to ensure that the Board benefits from a range of perspectives and to  enhance the diversity of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also conducts annual  self-assessments and director evaluations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes it is in  the best position to determine the appropriate length of service for a  director and overall board tenure, with its current mix providing for a  highly effective and functioning Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Diversity
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board does not have a formal policy with respect to diversity,  but recognizes the value of a diverse Board and thus has included  diversity as a factor that is taken into consideration in its Board  Membership Criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When it considers the composition of the Board, especially when  adding new directors, the Board Composition and Governance  Committee assesses the skills and experience of Board members  and compares them to the skills that might benefit the Company in  light of the current Board composition.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee seeks people  with a variety of occupational and personal backgrounds to ensure  that the Board benefits from a range of perspectives and to enhance  the diversity of the Board in such areas as experience, geography,  race, gender and ethnicity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When selecting director candidates, the  Committee may establish specific skills, experiences or backgrounds  that it believes the Board should seek in order to achieve balance  and effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareowner Alignment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board believes its interests are aligned with shareowners both  economically and in carrying out its responsibilities to the Company  and its shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our director compensation program is designed to align director  compensation directly with the interests of shareowners by paying a  meaningful portion of director compensation in shares of our common  stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To further align their interests, directors can defer cash fees to  restricted stock units that are paid out in shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, directors  are subject to stock ownership requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They are required to  own shares of our common stock equal in value to five times the  portion of the annual retainer payable in cash (with the cash retainer  for fiscal 2017 at $87,500).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All current directors exceed their ownership  guidelines except Mr. Rosamilia, who joined the Board in 2016, and  Ms. Watson, who joined the Board in 2017, and they are on track to  meet the requirements within the five-year transition period contained  in our stock ownership guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: None of our directors receive  compensation for their Board service from any source other than  the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that it is important that its members reflect diverse  viewpoints so that, as a group, the Board includes a sufficient mix  of perspectives to allow the Board best to fulfill its responsibilities  to shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Refreshment and Tenure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A continuing priority of the Board is ensuring the Board is composed  of directors who bring diverse perspective and viewpoints and have a variety of skills, experiences and backgrounds to enable the Board to  effectively represent the long-term interests of shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We seek to maintain a Board with experienced leaders who are familiar  with governance issues and compliance with the laws and regulations  applicable to our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board monitors shareowner views and  considers shareowner feedback and perspectives in establishing and  evaluating Company policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is mindful that director tenure can be relevant to the  Boards performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that this is a matter that  should be discussed and evaluated by the Board from time to time  and it depends on the Boards current situation and the needs of  the Company.

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Guidelines on Corporate Governance require that a substantial  majority of the members of the Board be independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For  a director to be independent, the Board must affirmatively determine  that the director has no direct or indirect material relationship with  the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has established guidelines, which are  contained in our Guidelines on Corporate Governance, to assist it  in determining director independence in conformity with the NYSE  listing requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These guidelines are available on our website at  https://ir.rockwellautomation.com/corporate-governance/  governance-documents/default.aspx.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After considering these guidelines and the independence criteria of  the NYSE, the Board has determined that none of the current directors,  other than Mr. Nosbusch (who is a former employee of the Company)  and Mr. Moret (who is a current employee of the Company), have a  material relationship with the Company and each of these directors  (other than Mr. Nosbusch and Mr. Moret) is independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There were  no transactions, relationships or arrangements that required review  by the Board for purposes of determining director independence in  fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board has determined that each director is financially literate and possesses the skills, judgment, experience,  reputation and commitment to make a constructive contribution to the Board.

sentences.text: Executive Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overview
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rockwell Automation has a long-standing and strong orientation toward pay for performance in its executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We  maintain this orientation throughout economic cycles that may cause fluctuation in our operating results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are pleased to report that fiscal  2017 was a very good year with 14% EPS growth on 7.3% higher sales compared to fiscal 2016 and another strong year of free cash flow  generation and return on invested capital (ROIC) performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our fiscal 2017 total shareowner return (TSR) was 51.3% and at the 94th percentile  of the companies in the S&P 500 Index.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation decisions made for fiscal 2017 reflect our Companys strong business performance relative to the goals set out for the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We  are performance-oriented and set stretch financial goals, balancing rewards with appropriate risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In light of our pay-for-performance philosophy  and based on our sales and Adjusted EPS performance, the fiscal 2017 Annual Incentive Compensation Plan (ICP) payouts averaged above target  (average payout of 134%) for named executive officers (NEOs).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the performance period from October 1, 2014 to September 30, 2017, our three year TSR of 60.3% was at the 73rd percentile of the companies  in the S&P 500 Index, resulting in 187% of the target number of performance shares being earned for that performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe  all of the decisions described in this proxy statement reflect this orientation toward pay for performance and our ongoing commitment to  this philosophy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At our 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareowners, 90% of the shares voted at the meeting approved our  executive compensation programs.

sentences.text: We believe these results represent a strong endorsement of our executive compensation philosophy and  pay programs.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Early in the year, the Board of Directors approved an annual operating plan that reflected our expectations for our performance during fiscal 2017.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee determined that meeting these goals  would require significant effort and achievement on the part of the  management team and all Company employees in the continued  execution of our growth and performance strategy.

sentences.text: All goals are reset each year, with the requirement that  Adjusted EPS and sales goals require year over year improvement.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The free cash flow  goal was set at 105% of Adjusted Net Income.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee used the annual operating plan as the  basis for setting goals for sales, Adjusted EPS, ROIC, free cash flow and  segment operating earnings under our incentive compensation plans.

sentences.text: Compensation Deductibility
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internal Revenue Code Section 162(m) provides that we may not  deduct in any taxable year compensation in excess of $1 million paid in  that year to our chief executive officer and our other three most highly  compensated executive officers, other than the chief financial officer,  unless the compensation is performance-based.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grants of stock options,  performance shares and awards under our Senior ICP are considered  performance-based compensation for this purpose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base salaries  and restricted stock awards do not qualify as performance-based  compensation for this purpose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With the exception of the portion of  restricted stock granted to Mr. Moret, we do not anticipate that any  other portion of our fiscal 2017 compensation to the NEOs covered by  Section 162(m) will exceed the deductibility limitations of Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deductibility under Section 162(m) of the Code is one of many factors  the Company takes into account in determining executive officer  compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From time to time certain nondeductible compensation  may be paid and the Board and the Compensation Committee reserve  the authority to award nondeductible compensation to executive  officers in appropriate circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Despite the Committees efforts  to structure certain incentives in a manner that is exempt from  Section 162(m) and therefore not subject to its deduction limits, no  assurance can be given that compensation we intend to satisfy the  requirements for exemption from Section 162(m) in fact will.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, it  is possible that changes in legislation will eliminate the exemption from  Section 162(m) for certain types of compensation.

sentences.text: In the case of terminations other than those to which our change  of control agreements apply, we have no severance agreements in  place with the NEOs.

sentences.text: Second, the agreements seek to ensure continuity of business  operations during times of potential uncertainty, by removing the  incentive to seek other employment in anticipation of a possible  change of control.

sentences.text: Under our trading procedures, officers may not engage in any  transactions involving Company securities, including gifts and option  exercises, without first obtaining pre-clearance of the transaction  from our General Counsel.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a window,

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The tables and narrative below describe and quantify compensation  that would become payable to the named executive officers under  existing plans and arrangements if the named executive officers  employment had terminated on September 30, 2017 for the reasons  set forth below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not have employment agreements with the  named executive officers, but do have change of control agreements  with Messrs. Moret, Goris, Chand, Crandall, Kulaszewicz, and  McDermott and certain other officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are two main purposes of  these agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have change of control agreements with Mr. Moret and each  of the other named executive officers and certain other officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These agreements become effective if there is a change of control  on or before September 30, 2019.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each agreement provides for the  continuing employment of the executive for two years after the  change of control on conditions no less favorable than those in  effect before the change of control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the executives employment  is terminated by us without cause or if the executive terminates  his employment for good reason within that two year period, each  agreement entitles the executive to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. They provide protection for the executive officers who would  negotiate any potential acquisitions of the Company, thus  encouraging them to negotiate a good outcome for shareowners, without concern that their negotiating stance will put at risk their  financial situation immediately after an acquisition.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: severance benefits payable as a lump sum equal to two times  (three times in the case of Mr. Moret) his annual compensation,  including target ICP;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: annual ICP payment prorated through the date of termination  payable as a lump sum, based upon the average of the previous  three years ICP payments; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. The agreements seek to ensure continuity of business operations  during times of potential uncertainty, by removing the incentive  to seek other employment in anticipation of a possible change  of control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: continuation of other benefits and perquisites for two years (three  years in the case of Mr. Moret).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In short, the change of control agreements seek to ensure that we may  rely on key executives to continue to manage our business consistent  with our best interests despite concerns for personal risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not  believe these agreements encourage our executives to favor or oppose  a change of control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe these agreements strike a balance  that the amounts are neither so low to cause an executive to oppose  a change of control nor so high as to cause an executive to favor a  change of control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in the past we at times have entered  into severance arrangements with executive officers upon termination  of their employment, with the terms and conditions depending on  the individual circumstances of the termination, the transition role  we expect from the officer and our best interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information set  forth below does not include payments and benefits to the extent  they are provided on a non-discriminatory basis to salaried employees  upon termination of employment, including unused vacation pay,  distributions of balances under savings and deferred compensation  plans and accrued pension benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The information set forth below  also does not include any payments and benefits that may be provided  under severance arrangements that may be entered into with any  named executive officer upon termination of their employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The agreements do not include a provision that entitles the executives  to receive tax gross-ups related to any excise tax imposed on change  of control agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In each change of control agreement, the  executive agreed to certain confidentiality provisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the change of control agreements, a change of control would  include any of the following events:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: any person, as defined in Section 13(d)(3) or 14(d)(2) of the  Exchange Act, acquires 20 percent or more of our outstanding  voting securities;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a majority of our directors are replaced by persons who are not  endorsed by a majority of our directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: we are involved in a reorganization, merger, sale of assets or other  business combination that results in our shareowners owning 50% or less of our outstanding shares or the outstanding shares of the  resulting entity; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: shareowners approve a liquidation or dissolution of the Company.

sentences.text: AUDIT MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal to Approve the Selection of Independent Registered-Public  Accounting Firm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is directly responsible for the appointment,  compensation, retention and oversight of the Companys independent  auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee annually evaluates the qualifications,  performance and independence of the Companys independent  auditor and considers whether there should be a change of the  independent audit firm and potential impact of making a change.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  Audit Committee reviews all non-audit services that the independent  auditor may provide and conducts regular private sessions with the  independent auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has selected the firm of Deloitte & Touche LLP  (D&T) as our independent registered public accounting firm for the  fiscal year ending September 30, 2018 (the D&T appointment), subject  to the approval of the shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: D&T and its predecessors have  acted as the independent registered public accounting firm for the  Company and its predecessors since 1934.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Before the Audit Committee selected D&T as its auditors for fiscal  2018, it carefully considered the independence and qualifications of  that firm, including their performance in prior years, their tenure as  our independent auditors, the appropriateness of their fees, and their  reputation for integrity and for competence in the fields of accounting  and auditing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on this evaluation, the Committee believes it is  in the best interests of the Company and its shareowners for D&T to  continue as its independent auditors for fiscal 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee annually reviews and evaluates the lead audit  partner and is involved in the process of the independent audit firms  selection of a new lead audit partner when rotation is required after 5  years under the SECs audit partner rotation rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The selection process  includes a meeting between the Chair of the Audit Committee and  the candidate for lead audit partner as well as discussion by the full  Committee and with management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We expect that representatives of D&T will attend the Annual Meeting  to answer appropriate questions and make a statement if they desire  to do so.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Company policy generally restricts the hiring of certain individuals  who have been employed by the independent auditor until after a  two year cooling off period, which is more restrictive than regulatory  requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We understand the need to maintain the independence  of the Companys independent auditor both in appearance and in fact.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends that you vote FOR the proposal to approve the selection of Deloitte & Touche LLP as our  independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee assists the Board in overseeing and monitoring  the integrity of the Companys financial reporting processes, its internal control and disclosure control systems, the integrity and audits of  its financial statements, the Companys compliance with legal and  regulatory requirements, the qualifications and independence of its  independent registered public accounting firm and the performance  of its internal audit function and independent registered public  accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We reviewed and approved all audit and audit-related fees and  services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For information on fees paid to D&T for each of the last two  years, see the section entitled Proposal to Approve the Selection of  Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We considered the non-audit services provided by D&T in fiscal year  2017 and determined that engaging D&T to provide those services is  compatible with and does not impair D&Ts independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fulfilling our responsibilities, we met with the Companys General  Auditor and D&T, with and without management present, to discuss  the results of their examinations, the evaluations of the Companys  internal control over financial reporting and the overall quality of the  Companys financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We considered the status of pending  litigation, taxation matters and other areas of oversight relating to  the financial reporting and audit processes that we determined  appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We discussed with management the Companys major  financial risk exposures and the steps management has taken to  monitor and control such exposures, including the Companys risk  assessment and risk management policies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also met separately  with the Companys Chief Executive Officer, Chief Financial Officer,  Controller, General Counsel and Ombudsman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Committees roles and responsibilities are set forth in a written  Charter adopted by the Board, which is available on the Companys  website at http://www.rockwellautomation.com under the Investors  link.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We review and reassess the Charter annually, and more frequently  as necessary to address any changes in NYSE corporate governance  and SEC rules regarding audit committees, and recommend any  changes to the Board for approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the Companys financial statements  and the reporting processes, including the system of internal control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deloitte & Touche LLP (D&T), the Companys independent registered  public accounting firm, is responsible for expressing an opinion on the  conformity of those audited financial statements with U.S. generally  accepted accounting principles, and on the Companys internal control  over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on our review of the audited financial statements and the  discussions and reports referred to above, we recommended to  the Board that the audited financial statements be included in the  Companys Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended  September 30, 2017 for filing with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Committee is responsible for overseeing the Companys overall  financial reporting processes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fulfilling our responsibilities for the  financial statements for fiscal year 2017, we:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviewed and discussed the audited financial statements for  the fiscal year ended September 30, 2017 and quarterly financial  statements with management and D&T;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviewed managements assessment of the Companys internal  control over financial reporting and D&Ts report pursuant to  Section 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discussed with D&T the matters required to be discussed by Public  Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States) (PCAOB)  Auditing Standard No. 16 Communication with Audit Committees  and Rule 2-07 of SEC Regulation S-X relating to the conduct of the  audit; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Received written disclosures and the letter from D&T regarding its  independence as required by PCAOB Ethics and Independence  Rule 3526.

sentences.text: We also discussed with D&T its independence.

sentences.text: PROPOSAL TO APPROVE COMPENSATION OF  OUR NAMED EXECUTIVE OFFICERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proposal will be presented at the meeting asking shareowners to approve on an advisory basis the compensation of our named executive officers as described in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why You Should Approve our Executive Compensation Programs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation philosophy is designed to attract and retain  executive talent and emphasize pay for performance, including the  creation of shareowner value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation programs include  base salary, annual incentive compensation, long-term incentives,  defined benefit and defined contribution retirement plans and a  limited perquisite package.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage shareowners to read the  Executive Compensation section of this proxy statement, including  the Compensation Discussion and Analysis (CD&A) and compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: tables, for a more detailed discussion of our compensation programs  and policies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our compensation programs and policies  are appropriate and effective in implementing our compensation  philosophy and in achieving our goals with the appropriate level of  risk, and that they are aligned with shareowner interests and worthy of  continued shareowner support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that shareowners should consider the following in  determining whether to approve this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Program is Highly Aligned with Shareowner Value
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of our executives compensation is directly  linked to our performance and the creation of shareowner value  because the majority of their Total Direct Compensation is in the  form of performance-based annual and long-term incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our long-term incentive awards consist of three vehicles: stock
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: options, performance shares and restricted stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this  mix appropriately motivates long-term performance and rewards  executives for both absolute gains in share price and relative  performance related to total shareowner return compared to the  aggregate performance of the S&P 500 Index.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strong Pay-for-Performance Orientation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain a consistent pay-for-performance approach to setting  ICP targets and payouts over time have reflected this philosophy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The past five years illustrate the consistent application of this philosophy ICP awards were above target in fiscal 2014 and 2017 because we  exceeded some or all of our financial goals in those respective years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For fiscal 2013 and 2015, we did not meet all the stretch financial goals set at the beginning of those years and ICP awards were below target.

sentences.text: The independent inspector of  election and any employees involved in processing proxy cards or  ballots and tabulating the vote are required to comply with this policy  of confidentiality.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition you may vote by proxy:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if you received a Notice, by submitting the proxy over the internet  by following the instructions on the Notice; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if you received a paper copy of the proxy materials:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: for shareowners of record and participants in our savings  plans and Wells Fargo Shareowner Services Plus Plan (dividend  reinvestment and stock purchase plan), by completing, signing  and returning the enclosed proxy card or direction card, or via  the internet or by telephone; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: for shares held in street name, by using the method directed  by your broker or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote over the  internet or by telephone if your broker or nominee makes  those methods available, in which case they will provide  instructions with your proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is required for there to be a quorum at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of at least a majority of the shares of our common stock issued  and outstanding on the record date for the Annual Meeting must be  present, in person or by proxy, for there to be a quorum in order to  conduct business at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How will my proxy be voted?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you properly complete, sign and return a proxy or use our telephone or internet voting procedures to authorize the named proxies to  vote your shares, your shares will be voted as specified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your proxy  card is signed but does not contain specific instructions, your shares  will be voted as recommended by our Board, subject to applicable  NYSE regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes are needed to approve each of the proposals?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal Vote  Required Broker  Discretionary  Voting Allowed Election of Directors Plurality of  votes cast No D&T Appointment Majority of  votes cast Yes Advisory Approval of Executive  Compensation Majority of  votes cast No
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For shareowners participating in our savings plans or in the Wells  Fargo Shareowner Services Plus Plan, the trustee or administering  bank will vote the shares that it holds for a participants account  only in accordance with instructions given in a signed, completed  and returned proxy card or direction card, or in accordance with  instructions given pursuant to our internet or telephone voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: www.rockwellautomation.com 65
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information About the  Meeting and Voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are elected by a plurality of votes  cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This means that the four nominees for election as directors  who receive the greatest number of votes cast by the holders of our  common stock entitled to vote at the meeting will become directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In an uncontested election where the number of nominees equals  the number of director seats up for election, all the nominees will be  elected as long as there is a quorum and somebody votes for their  election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The election of directors, however, is subject to our director  resignation policy if a director fails to receive a majority vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: minimum number of affirmative votes required to approve the D&T  appointment and approve on an advisory basis the compensation of  our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the effect of an abstention?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shares of a shareowner who abstains from voting on a matter  will be counted for purposes of determining whether a quorum is  present at the meeting so long as the shareowner is present in person  or represented by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An abstention from voting on a matter by a  shareowner present in person or represented by proxy at the meeting  has no effect in the election of directors, but has the same legal effect  as a vote against the proposals to approve the D&T appointment and  the compensation of our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Guidelines on Corporate Governance set forth our policy if a  director is elected by a plurality of votes cast but receives a greater  number of votes withheld from his or her election than votes for  such election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In an uncontested election, any nominee for director  who receives more votes withheld than votes for his or her election  must promptly tender his or her resignation to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board  Composition and Governance Committee will consider the resignation  offer and make a recommendation to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will act on  the tendered resignation within 90 days following certification of the  election results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board Composition and Governance Committee,  in making its recommendation, and the Board, in making its decision,  may consider any factors or other information that it considers  appropriate and relevant, including any stated reasons why the  shareowners withheld votes from the director, the directors tenure, the  directors qualifications, the directors past and expected contributions  to the Board, and the overall composition of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will  promptly disclose the Boards decision regarding whether to accept or  reject the directors resignation offer in a Form 8-K furnished to the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Board rejects the tendered resignation or pursues any additional  action, the disclosure will include the rationale behind the decision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any director who tenders his or her resignation may not participate in  the Board Composition and Governance Committee deliberations and  recommendation or in the Boards decision whether to accept or reject  the resignation offer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How will votes be counted on shares held through brokers?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Brokers are not entitled to vote on the election of directors or the  advisory proposal to approve the compensation of our named executive  officers, unless they receive voting instructions from the beneficial  owner, however, under NYSE rules, brokers may use discretionary  authority to vote on routine items such as the ratification of auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a broker does not receive voting instructions, the broker may return  a proxy card voting on routine items with no vote on the election of  directors and the advisory proposal to approve the compensation of our  named executive officers, which is usually referred to as a broker non- vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shares of a shareowner whose shares are not voted because  of a broker non-vote on a particular matter will be counted for purposes  of determining whether a quorum is present at the meeting so long  as the shareowner is represented by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote has no  effect in the election of directors or the advisory proposal to approve the  compensation of our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I receive electronic access to shareowner materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As noted above, SEC rules permit us to furnish proxy materials to  shareowners via the internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, we may choose to continue to  provide printed copies to certain shareowners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If we send you printed  copies, you can save us printing and mailing costs by electing to access  proxy statements, annual reports and related materials electronically  instead of receiving these documents in print.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must have an e-mail  account and access to the internet and expect to have such access  in the future to be eligible for electronic access to these materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To  enroll for these services, please go to https://enroll.icsdelivery.com/rok_  or visit our website at www.rockwellautomation.com, click on Investors,  then under Shareowner Resources, click on Investor Contact, and  you will find the link under the subheading Electronic Delivery  under Transfer Agent & Dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own your shares through a  broker or other nominee, you may contact them directly to request  electronic access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: D&T Appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An affirmative vote of the holders of a majority  of the voting power of our common stock present in person or  represented by proxy and entitled to vote on the matter is necessary to  approve the D&T appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation of Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An affirmative vote of  the holders of a majority of the voting power of our common stock  present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote on the  matter is necessary to approve on an advisory basis the compensation  of our named executive officers, although such vote will not be  binding on us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are votes counted?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Delaware law and our certificate of incorporation and by- laws, all votes entitled to be cast by shareowners present in person  or represented by proxy at the meeting and entitled to vote on the  subject matter, whether those shareowners vote for, against or  abstain from voting, will be counted for purposes of determining the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your consent to electronic access will be effective until you revoke it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may cancel your consent at no cost to you at any time by going to  https://enroll.icsdelivery.com/rok_ and following the instructions or by  contacting your broker or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
